title: 3 and Out Mailbag - Hurts Future, Watson Mess, Rams Rainmaking, Obscenely Early Playoff Picks
itunes:title: 3 and Out Mailbag - Hurts Future, Watson Mess, Rams Rainmaking, Obscenely Early Playoff Picks
description:
John answers listener questions in his weekend Mailbag, including how Jalen Hurts can convince the Eagles he’s the QB of the future, if Deshaun Watson red flags should have been noticed earlier, how the Rams are able to pay so many stars under the cap, if the Broncos should be considered the AFC West favorites, if the Vikings are underrated, if anyone can challenge the Bills in the AFC East, if John has been too hard on Brandon Staley, and reasonable expectations for the Jets.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and FanDuel for the best wagering action! #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
